Sun.en: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
Sun.de: Aus Z-Kraft hergestellte Energiebälle prallen mit voller Wucht auf das Ziel. Die Stärke variiert je nach zugrunde liegender Attacke.

Moon.en: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
